sentences.en: A beloved priest died giving the last rites to a firefighter.
sentences.cn: 一名深受爱戴的牧师在临终前还在为消防人员念着祷文.

sentences.en: A firefighter was overcome by fumes at a blaze in a plastics factory.
sentences.cn: 一名消防队员在一家塑料厂的火灾中被烟熏倒了.

sentences.en: All the people in the building were saved, but a firefighter lost his life.
sentences.cn: 大楼里的全部人员都获救, 而一名消防队员丧生.

sentences.en: Courage is being a firefighter or a police officer.
sentences.cn: 勇气,是立志做一名消防员,或是一名警察.

sentences.en: Firefighter : Hey, Chief ! TITe's a pumper truck be auctioned nowadays. Let's buy it.
sentences.cn: 消防队员: 嘿, 头儿,今天有一辆1959年的消防卡车要拍卖, 咱们买了吧.

sentences.en: Great! My brother is a firefighter too. I really like firefighters.
sentences.cn: 太棒了! 我哥哥也是一名消防员. 我很喜欢消防员.

sentences.en: He and his firefighter buddies phone local stores and malls.
sentences.cn: 他和消防队的朋友们则给当地的商店--以及商场打电话.

sentences.en: He mows lawns and gardens for half a dozen clients in Grafton, some of them family friends. And he is an active volunteer firefighter.
sentences.cn: 他为格拉夫顿六户人家修剪草坪和花园，他们中一些是父母的朋友，此外他还是个积极的义务消防员。

sentences.en: He wants to be a firefighter.
I want to be a firefighter.
John is a New York City firefighter.
sentences.cn: 约翰是纽约市的一名消防员.

sentences.en: Locally and from the state standpoint, we had some firefighter jobs that were in jeopardy, up in the hundreds.
sentences.cn: 站在州政府的立场，我们有一些消防员在危险岗位工作，最多时有数百人。

sentences.en: The firefighter banked the fire with dirt.
The firefighter manned the hose to extinguish the blaze.
sentences.cn: 该名消防队员操纵消防软管扑灭大火.

sentences.en: The firefighter put his life in danger to extinguish the forest fire.
sentences.cn: 消防员冒着生命危险扑灭森林大火.

sentences.en: The firefighter survivors all wore the grimmest pride on their faces.
sentences.cn: 活着归来的消防员脸上都带着极为严肃的自豪.

sentences.en: When every molecule in your body tells you to run away from the burning building, as a firefighter you have to resist the urge, override it and plunge in.
sentences.cn: 当你身体内每个细胞都告诉逃离失火的建筑物时，作为一名消防员，你必须克制这种冲动，超越它，投入火场进行战斗。

words.tran_cn: 消防队员；救火队员；锅炉工

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to stop fires burning
